description: Looking for a quick and easy dessert that looks spectacular? Mini pavlovas are the secret to this stunning dessert and with a rich dollop of cream and berries, it's sure to be a hit.
name: Mini Berry Pavlova Tree Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp Queen Organic Vanilla Bean Paste

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange 8 meringues in a circle on a platter, then place 1 or 2 meringues in the centre. Top each meringue with a dollop of cream mixture, then continue layering with remaining meringues and cream to create a tree shape. Arrange mint, blueberries and extra raspberries on meringue tree. Scatter over hazelnuts and chocolate, then serve immediately with remaining raspberry mixture and extra cream.
